latest_revision.text:
As per our transition away from a nanny-board, I have a list of ops positions currently under consideration:

* '''Blogger''' - Writes Meeting, Local Project, and This Week in Photos blog posts.
* '''Photographer''' - Takes awesome photos of stuff that happens in the lab and things built there.
* '''Events Coordinator''' - Hunts down and books speakers, gets meeting info to the Office of Marketing and Blogger.
* '''Resource Manager''' - Basically the same things the Resource board position did.
* '''Resource Manager''' - Responsible for matters regarding HeatSync Labs's physical space.
* '''Minister/Ministress of Propaganda''' - Designs branded materials, such as business cards, stickers, shirts, bandanas, and flags.
* '''Grant Hunter''' - Person to hunt down grants and either apply for them on HSL's behalf or forward info to people that might be interested.
* '''Ambassador''' - Tell other hackerspaces about HeatSync Labs and what its up to, especially at Hackerspace call-in, Hacker/Maker events, and visits to other hackerspaces.
